chapters.title: Welcome to Space Farm!
chapters.story:
Hi there, little farmer! I'm Astro the Astronaut! 👨‍🚀

Welcome to our amazing Space Farm where we grow plants using data from NASA satellites! 🛰️

Today, you'll help me take care of our space garden. Are you ready for this awesome adventure?

chapters.title: Meet Our Friends
chapters.story:
Great! Let me introduce you to our space farming team! 🤖⭐

This is Cosmo the Robot - he watches our plants from space! And this is Stella the Star - she makes everything grow with her magic! ✨

Together, we'll learn how to help plants grow using information from NASA satellites!

chapters.title: The Challenge Begins!
chapters.story:
Perfect! Now here's how our space farming game works: 🌱

NASA satellites send us important messages about our plants. When you see an alert, you need to help by choosing the right action!

Remember: 💧 Water for thirsty plants, ☀️ Shade for hot plants, 🌾 Food for hungry plants, and 🛡️ Protection for scared plants!

Let's start farming!

actions.text: Let's start! I want to help! 🌱

chapters.title: Game Time!
chapters.story:
Excellent! The game is starting now! 🎮

Watch for NASA alerts and help our plants grow! You have 60 seconds to help as many plants as you can!

Good luck, little farmer! 🌟

gameEvents.story:
Oh no! Our plants are thirsty! 💧

Cosmo says: 'The soil is too dry! We need water!'
gameEvents.successMessage: Great job! You gave our plants water! 🌱✨
gameEvents.nasaFact: NASA satellites can see when soil is dry from space! They help farmers know when to water their crops!

gameEvents.story:
It's getting too hot! ☀️

Stella says: 'The sun is too strong! Our plants need shade!'
gameEvents.successMessage: Perfect! You protected our plants from the hot sun! 🌿
gameEvents.nasaFact: NASA watches Earth's temperature every day! They help us understand weather changes!

gameEvents.story:
Our plants are hungry! 🌾

Astro says: 'The plants need more food to grow big and strong!'
gameEvents.successMessage: Wonderful! You fed our hungry plants! 🌱💚
gameEvents.nasaFact: NASA helps farmers know exactly what nutrients their plants need by looking at them from space!

gameEvents.story:
A big storm is coming! ⛈️

Terra says: 'We need to protect our plants from the wind and rain!'
gameEvents.successMessage: Excellent! You kept our plants safe from the storm! 🛡️
gameEvents.nasaFact: NASA satellites can predict storms 7 days before they happen! This helps farmers protect their crops!

achievements.title: Space Farming Hero!
achievements.description: You helped lots of plants grow!

achievements.title: Getting Started!
achievements.description: Keep practicing to help more plants!
